item.title: CVE-2024-30519|2024-03-29T13:01:19.922Z -- Lordicon -- Lordicon Animated Icons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lordicon Lordicon Animated Icons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Lordicon Animated Icons: from n/a through 2.0.1.
